name: Brian Fillion
bio: Brian Fillion is a AI Programmer at Ubisoft Montreal. Winner of the Ubisoft Game Lab Competition in 2015. Brian’s main interest on AI includes reasoning systems, systemic realization and dynamic music. He was involved in Assassin’s Creed Syndicate and is currently working on Assassin’s Creed Origins. Currently trying to push new standards for systemically driven AI realization.
